attributes.action: save Saturday Morning TV for children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The aim of this petition is to encourage OFCOM to encourage the broadcasters to remake saturday morning children's television to how it use to be up until recently.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government Policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
